properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 11 at 7:15PM EST until February 11 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...A dangerous snow squall capable of producing near whiteout conditions and wind gusts up to 45 mph.

* WHERE...Portions of southeastern Michigan including Wayne County.

* WHEN...Until 8:00 PM EST.

* IMPACTS...Travel will become hazardous and potentially life-threatening within minutes. Rapid reductions in visibility and snow-covered roads are expected.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...At 7:15 PM EST, a snow squall was located over Detroit, moving east at 35 mph.
properties.instruction: Slow down immediately and turn on headlights. Leave extra space between vehicles. Avoid sudden braking or acceleration. If possible, delay travel until the squall passes.

NWSheadline: SNOW SQUALL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING
